name: CLAIM_INFO2
description: This table contains claims information from claim information (CLM) records for both Hospital and Professional Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the claim information record.

columns.name: CVR_NUM_TIMES_PREG
columns.description: Number of pregnancies, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_NUM_BIRTHS
columns.description: Number of births, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: NUM_LIVING_CHILDREN
columns.description: Number of living children, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_VISIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR) visit type.

columns.name: CVR_PRV_COUN_EDU_C_NAME
columns.description: Provider of counseling and educational services for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_CONTRA_BEFORE_C_NAME
columns.description: Contraceptive method, before visit for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_CONTRA_AFTER_C_NAME
columns.description: Contraceptive method, after visit for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_REASON_CO_C_NAME
columns.description: Reason for using no contraceptive method, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_INT_CODE
columns.description: Internal use code, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR) status.

columns.name: TPR_INS_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Third Party Resource Insurance Code from Medicare.
entries: Service not covered by insurance policy
Patient not covered by insurance policy
Insurance lapsed or not in effect on date of service
Insurance payment went to policy holder
Service not authorized or prior authorized by insurance
Service not considered emergency by insurance
Service not provided by primary care provider facility
Requested information not received by insurance from client
Requested information not received by insurance from policy holder
Motor vehicle accident fund maximum benefits exhausted
Insurance mandated under court order not paid within 30 days
Primary Insurance Paid - Secondary Under Deductible
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Service Not Covered
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Patient Not Covered
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Lapsed or Not in effect
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Payment went to patient
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Payment Went to Policyholder
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Denied-Service Not Authorized
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Denied-Service Not Considered Emergency
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Denied-Svc Not Provided by Primary Care Provider/Fac
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Denied-Maximum Benefits Used for Diagnosis/Condition
Primary Insurance Paid-Secondary Denied-Requested Info Not Received from Policyholder
Denied-Requested Information Not Received from Patient
Service Not Covered by Primary or Secondary Insurance

columns.name: BLOOD_FURNISHED
columns.description: Pints of blood furnished.

columns.name: BLOOD_REPLACED
columns.description: Pints of blood replaced.

columns.name: BLOOD_NOT_REPLACED
columns.description: Pints of blood not replaced.

columns.name: BLOOD_DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: The number of pints of blood that are deductible.

columns.name: PSROUR_APRV_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: Professional Standards Review Organization Utilization Review (PSRO/UR) approval indicator.

columns.name: PSROUR_APRV_FROM_DT
columns.description: Professional Standards Review Organization Utilization Review (PSRO/UR) approval date.

columns.name: PSROUR_APRV_TO_DT
columns.description: Professional Standards Review Organization Utilization Review (PSRO/UR) approval expiry date.

columns.name: NUM_OF_GRACE_DAYS
columns.description: Number of grace days.

columns.name: TREAT_AUTH_CODE
columns.description: Treatment authorization code.

columns.name: PART_A_EXHAUST_DT
columns.description: The date a patient's Medicare Part A benefits are exhausted.

columns.name: PAT_HEIGHT
columns.description: Patient height in inches.

columns.name: PAT_WEIGHT
columns.description: Patient weight in ounces.

columns.name: BIRTH_WEIGHT_WT
columns.description: The patient's birth weight.

columns.name: SYSTOLIC_BP
columns.description: Blood pressure - systolic.

columns.name: DIASTOLIC_BP
columns.description: Blood pressure - diastolic.

columns.name: PAT_VISIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's visit type for the State of California Child Health and Disability Prevention (CDHP) visit.

columns.name: PAT_SCREEN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of screening performed during the State of California Child Health and Disability Prevention (CDHP) visit.

columns.name: WIC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's status in the Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) program.

columns.name: PAT_SCRN_PARTIAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the State of California Child Health and Disability Prevention (CDHP) visit was a partial screening, or a recheck for an earlier screening.

columns.name: PAT_PRIOR_SCREEN_DT
columns.description: Date of prior screening.

columns.name: HEAD_START_YN
columns.description: Indicate whether this patient has been referred by a Head Start or a State Preschool program for this State of California Child Health and Disability Prevention (CDHP) visit.

columns.name: HEAD_START_NUMBER
columns.description: The 5 digit Head Start Grantee number, or the 11 digit State Preschool Project number for the program which referred the patient for this State of California Child Health and Disability Prevention (CHDP) visit.

columns.name: FOSTER_CHILD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is a foster child in the State of California Child Health and Disability Prevention (CHDP) program.

columns.name: TOBACCO_PASSIV_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether tobacco exposure has occurred.

columns.name: TOBACCO_USAGE_YN
columns.description: Indicated tobacco usage.

columns.name: TOBACCO_CNSL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether tobacco counseling was given.

columns.name: PAT_NEXT_VISIT_DT
columns.description: Next visit date.

columns.name: DENTAL_REFERRAL_YN
columns.description: Dental referral.

columns.name: BLOOD_LEAD_REF_YN
columns.description: Blood lead referrals.

columns.name: CONTRACEPTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description: Contraceptive method the patient is using.
entries: None: Seeking Preg;Test w/o Method Use;Deferred Activity

columns.name: CMN_ATTCH_TRNS_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: Attachment transmission code for the External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.
entries: Narrative segment included in this claim

columns.name: CMN_PUMP_NUM_C_NAME
columns.description: Pump type - question 1 on the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.
entries: Reserved for other or future use

columns.name: CMN_ADMIN_ROUT_C_NAME
columns.description: Administration route - question 4 on the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.
entries: Reserved for other or future use

columns.name: CMN_ADMIN_METH_C_NAME
columns.description: Administration method - question 5 on the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_CANCER_PAIN_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the patient's pain cannot be managed by oral/transdermal narcotics - question 7 on the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: ASSUMED_CARE_DT
columns.description: The assumed care date of the claim.

columns.name: RELINQ_CARE_DT
columns.description: The date care was relinquished.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_HOUR_TM
columns.description: The time the patient was discharged from inpatient care.

columns.name: BILL_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The second digit for the UB bill type.

columns.name: PRINCIPAL_PX_ID
columns.description: Principal International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedure.

columns.name: PRINCIPLE_PX_DESC
columns.description: Principal International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedure description.

columns.name: PRINCIPLE_PX_DT
columns.description: Principal International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedure date.

columns.name: PRINCIPAL_DX_ID
columns.description: Principal diagnosis.

columns.name: MEDICAID_CRN
columns.description: The Medicaid Claim Rejection Number if this claim was rejected by Medicaid (used by some states).

columns.name: MEDICAID_RA
columns.description: The Medicaid Remittance Advice cycle number in which this claim appeared if it was rejected by Medicaid (used by some states).

columns.name: MEDICAID_LT_CLM_CD
columns.description: The exception code for the claim if the claim is being submitted to Medicaid after the normal filing time limit (used by some states).

columns.name: HEMATOCRIT_CT
columns.description: The patient's hematocrit reading, between 18 and 72.

columns.name: HEMOGLOBIN_COUNT
columns.description: The patient's hemoglobin reading to the nearest 0.1 gram, between 6.0 and 24.0.

columns.name: BLOOD_PRESSURE
columns.description: Blood pressure.

columns.name: LAST_TREATMENT_DT
columns.description: The last treatment date.

columns.name: LMTD_RETURN_DT
columns.description: The date of limited return for Workers' Comp.

columns.name: COMP_XRAYS_YN
columns.description: Indicate if comparative x-rays were taken for the amputation.

columns.name: AMPUTATION
columns.description: Indicate what amputation was present.

columns.name: STUMP_CONDITION_C_NAME
columns.description: The condition of the amputation stump.

columns.name: DISCHRG_CURED_DT
columns.description: The date the patient was discharged as cured.

columns.name: STOPPED_TREAT_DT
columns.description: The date the patient stopped treatment without an order.

columns.name: REFUSED_TREAT_DT
columns.description: The date the patient refused treatment.

columns.name: PROGNOSIS
columns.description: The prognosis for the injury.

columns.name: FURTHER_TREATMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The likelihood of further treatment.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DESC
columns.description: The description of the further treatment that should be given to the patient.

columns.name: HEALING_END_YN
columns.description: Indicate if the healing period has ended.

columns.name: DISABLED_BODY_PART
columns.description: The part of the body that was affected.

columns.name: BODY_PART_DISABLD_C_NAME
columns.description: The affected body part.

columns.name: MIN_PERM_DISABILITY
columns.description: The minimum permanent disability expected if healing has not ended.

columns.name: PERCENT_DISABILITY
columns.description: The percentage of disability.

columns.name: SURGERY_PERF_YN
columns.description: Indicate if surgery was performed as a result of the injury.

columns.name: SURGERY_TYPE
columns.description: The type of surgery performed.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_DISABILITY
columns.description: The previous disability before the injury.

columns.name: CMN_INIT_CERT_DT
columns.description: Initial certification date for the External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_REV_CERT_DT
columns.description: Revised certification date for the External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_NUM_MONTH
columns.description: Estimated length of need, in months, for the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_HCPCS_CODE
columns.description: Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) code - question 2 on the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_NON_SPEC_CODE
columns.description: Drug name for non-specific drug codes - question 3 on the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_DRG_INF_DUR
columns.description: Total duration of infusion, in hours, per 24-hour period - question 6 on the 09.02 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_ROUTE_0903_C_NAME
columns.description: Administration route - question 3 on the 09.03 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: CMN_METHOD_0903_C_NAME
columns.description: Administration method - question 4 on the 09.03 External Infusion Pump Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) form.

columns.name: PLACE_OF_INJURY_C_NAME
columns.description: Place of injury.

columns.name: CITY
columns.description: City in which the accident happened.

columns.name: ZIP
columns.description: Zip code of the place where the accident happened.

columns.name: INFORMANT
columns.description: Informant of the accident.

columns.name: ACCOMP_PERSON
columns.description: The person the patient was accompanied by.

columns.name: POLICE_NOTIFIER
columns.description: The person the police were notified by.

columns.name: ACC_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: Accident county.

columns.name: OUT_CLM_YN
columns.description: Used to track charges and claims outside of the system.

columns.name: TPL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The third party liability status.

columns.name: WCAB_NUM
columns.description: The number assigned by the appeals board.

columns.name: CUMU_TRAUMA_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the claim is a cumulative trauma.

columns.name: AUTO_ACDNT_NUMBER
columns.description: Auto Accident Claim Number.

columns.name: E_CODE_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis ID number representing the external cause of the injury treated by procedures on the claim. This column will be deprecated in the May 2025 release. It is being replaced by column CODE_DX_ID in table EXTERNAL_CAUSES_OF_INJURY.

columns.name: OTHER_PROV_ID
columns.description: For Uniform Billing (UB) claims, the unique ID of other physician for the claim.

columns.name: OPERATING_PHYSIC_ID
columns.description: For Uniform Billing (UB) claims, the unique ID of operating physician for the claim.

columns.name: ATTEND_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the attending physician of the claim.

columns.name: AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Authorization Number: Used on claims for identifying patient referrals and affected reimbursements.

columns.name: UB92_TOB_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Override for the type of bill, a numeric code that provides encounter information to payers.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_PICK_CITY
columns.description: Stores the city of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_PICK_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the state of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_PICK_ZIP
columns.description: Stores the ZIP code of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_DROP_CITY
columns.description: Stores the city of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_DROP_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the state of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_DROP_ZIP
columns.description: Stores the ZIP code of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_DROP_NM
columns.description: Stores the last name or organization name of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_PAT_CNT
columns.description: Stores number of patients in the ambulance.

columns.name: WC_JURSD_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Workers' Comp insurance's state of jurisdiction.
